title: SaddleDonut Pro puts a bubbly cushion on your bike seat
content:
Whether riding on trail, gravel or smooth roads, long days in the saddle can be murder on your backside. Or, rather, your under-side. Even the best-designed saddles can rub riders the wrong way, leading to chafing, saddle sores, and all manner of aches and pains. The post-ride waddles may be a laughing matter for cyclists

The post SaddleDonut Pro puts a bubbly cushion on your bike seat appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Mark Wilson
